---
title: "Projektskrivning med R Markdown"
author: "Emma Pedersen"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: 
  pdf_document:
    fig_caption: true
    number_sections: true
    toc: true
    toc_depth: 3
bibliography: refs.bib
csl: apa.csl
urlcolor: black
linkcolor: black
fontsize: 12pt
geometry: "inner=25mm, outer=25mm, top=30mm, bottom=25mm"
indent: true
header-includes:
  - \usepackage{placeins}
  - \usepackage{setspace}
  - \onehalfspacing
  - \usepackage{chngcntr}
  - \counterwithin{figure}{section}
  - \counterwithin{table}{section}
  - \usepackage{subfig}
  - \usepackage{float}
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}

rm(list = ls())

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      fig.align = "center",
                      fig.width = 5,
                      fig.pos = "H",
                      fig.path = "figures/",
                      comment = NA,
                      cache = TRUE)

options(digits = 5)

```

```{r packages, include=FALSE}

sapply(c("kableExtra", "knitr", "readxl", "tidyverse"), 
       require, character.only = TRUE)

```
